name: 2D Shooter (hatfie73)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Tutorial for CAS 117.

Proposed Modifications (could be subject to change):

1) Reskinning the player

2) Creating more varied/different levels

3) Creating a new theme or "aesthetic" for the game

On level 1 you have to eliminate 3 enemies, level 2 eliminate 4, and level 3 eliminate 5.

Credits:

Created by Cameryn Hatfield
